Returns the underlying iterator. Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} be the underlying iterator.

@1@ Equivalent to: {{c|return current_;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to: {{c|return std::move(current_);}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
An iterator to the current element in {{tt|enumerate_view}}.
